label: AB6C3_oI20_71_a_el_bf-001
title: High-Temperature Cryolite (Na$_{3}$AlF$_{6}$) Structure
comments: Cryolite undergoes a phase transition from the \href{current_web_home_dir/AB6C3_mP20_14_a_3e_be-001}{monoclinic $J2_{6}$ phase}, space group $P2_{1}/c$ \#14, to this orthorhombic phase at 890K.  We show structural data taken at 900K.
